Kirsten Gillibrand focused her attention on two issues-cybersecurity and the hoarding of rare earth elements( REEs)- where she feels the Chinese are behaving inappropriately. Cybersecurity and REEs greatly affect both the national and economic security of the United States, and I continue to be concerned about China's policies regarding these two strategic interests, she wrote in her letter.
